# Vehicle level variables in the STATS19 datasets

Of the three dataset types in STATS19, the vehicle tables are perhaps the most revealing yet under-explored.
They look like this:

```{r}
v = get_stats19(year = 2017, type = "vehicles")
names(v)
summary(v)
```
